basisSet.dc:title: cc-pwCV5Z
basisSet.dc:description:
Correlation Consistent Polarized Core/Valence Quintuple Zeta (cc-pCV5Z) Basis ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References B - Ne: (18s,12p,7d,5f,3g,1h) -> [10s,9p,7d,5f,3g,1h] Al - Ar: (20s,12p,8d,6f,4g,2h) -> [11s,10p,8d,6f,4g,2h] K.A. Peterson and T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 117, 10548 (2002).
The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation.
cc-pwCV5Z Atomic Energies
State UHF (noneq) ROHF (noneq) ROHF(equiv) HF Limit (equiv) ----- ---------- ----------- ----------- --------- H 2-S -0.499995 -0.499995 -0.499995 -0.50000
